amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Energy to enter into an arrangement with the National Academy of Sciences for a study to determine the feasibility of using of mustard seed as a feedstock for biodiesel.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 109-49 to authorize a National Academy of Sciences study on the feasibility of mustard seed as a feedstock for biodiesel.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 259 - 171 (Roll no. 127).
